Posts.Content: I do not know about this treatment but do know of a man who cured his inoperable lung tumors with shark cartilage. His name is Hilos and he works in the food department at Target in Olathe, Kansas. His case is documented by a doctor in TX. Sharks cartilage apparently prevents the grown of blood vessels so tumors are cut off from their energy supply and die.
Posts.Title: Cesium (high ph Therapy) and Chemo
